description: This table contains the payment adjustments from value-based programs for AP Claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMPUTED_PROGRAM_ADJ
columns.description: The value-based program adjustment amount for the claim, as computed by the system.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PROGRAM_ADJ
columns.description: The value-based program adjustment amount for the claim, as overridden by a user.

columns.name: PROGRAM_ADJ_COMMENT
columns.description: The value-based program payment adjustment comment entered by the system when calculating the adjustment or by a user when overriding the adjustment.
